Name: 10mg: SLASHER, Interrupted
About the game: 10mg is a collection of 10 minute long games. SLASHER, Interrupted is a visual novel, in which you attempt to tell a horror story whilst your friends interrupt with their own ideas. Will you stick to a cohesive plot, or try and please everyone's ideas at once? Featuring: 7,000 words of lighthearted campfire banter A branching story with 27 ending combinations Pet a cat! Kill multiple characters! Get roasted for your messy plot choices!
